alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Moses Lake Area; Okanogan Valley; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 08 at 3:46PM PDT until July 09 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...High temperatures 96 to 102 degrees. Limited relief at night with low temperatures 63 to 71 degrees. * WHERE...Lapwai, Lewiston Grade, Pangborn Airport, Pomeroy, Okanogan, Ephrata, Peck, Chelan, Gifford, Alpowa Summit, Bridgeport, Nespelem, Culdesac, Number 2 Canyon, Cashmere, Omak, Lewiston, Number 1 Canyon, Disautel Pass, Wenatchee, Entiat, Clarkston, Brewster, Tonasket, Moses Lake, Othello, Quincy, and Oroville. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Moses Lake Area; Okanogan Valley; Wenatchee Area
